sections.heading: Capstone Brief
sections.body: Record a **60‚Äì75s** conversation (two signers). Include all required elements: description of a person, an opinion + WHY, a request/offer, a feelings check-in, and at least **one WH** and **one YES/NO** question.

callouts.title: Clause Size
callouts.body: Keep each idea short; if you have two details, split into two clauses.

sections.heading: Required Elements
sections.body:
Your conversation must include:
1) **Describing People:** HAVE/WEAR + COLOR (from 3.1)
2) **Opinion + WHY:** LIKE/DON‚ÄôT-LIKE ‚Üí BECAUSE/REASON (3.2)
3) **Feedback or Clarify:** HOW-IMPROVE? / PRACTICE/AGAIN (3.3)
4) **Request/Offer:** CAN, HELP-me/HELP-you, PLEASE/IF-POSSIBLE (3.4)
5) **Feeling Check-In:** HOW-FEEL? + brief reason (3.5)
6) **Small Talk Move:** WHAT‚ÄôS-UP? / LONG-TIME-NO-SEE / SAME/DIFFERENT (3.6)

sections.heading: Record
